welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lucon, France! Known for its picturesque streets, charming cafes, and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the unique culture of Lucon.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Laleu Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Laleu Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Les Ajoncs Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Les Ajoncs Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Talmont Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
